nodes.text: A Plague of Darkness was a roleplaying-game adventure in year five of the Living Force campaign. It was the first adventure in the Heart of Evil trilogy and was written by Ron Heintz and edited by Margaret Heintz.

The heroes are sent to investigate a plot by the Wyrd to gain control of the Ch'hala tree and thus control the whole of the ecology on Cularin. After a violent confrontation, Jedi Master Lanius Qel-Bertuk sacrifices himself to save the tree from them.
